original_text: So Joseph died at the age of a hundred and ten. And after they embalmed him, he was placed in a coffin in Egypt.
korean_text: 요셉이 백십 세에 죽으매 그들이 그의 몸에 향 재료를 넣고 애굽에서 입관하였더라

sentences.original_text: at the age of a hundred and ten

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 그의 시체를 처리한 후에

sentences.original_text: he was placed in a coffin
